articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.title: Microsoft says Apple's new App Store rules are 'a step in the wrong direction' - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft has joined Spotify and Epic Games in criticizing Apple’s new App Store changes for the EU. Xbox president Sarah Bond says they’re a “step in the wrong direction.”
articles.content:
Microsoft says Apples new App Store rules are a step in the wrong direction
